pages.text: $(li)The Tarantula Hawk Stinger is an item that can be used for craft the $(l:patchouli:weapons/spider_slayer_crossbow)Spider Slayer$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can only be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/tarantula_hawk)Tarantula Hawk$(/l) on death.
